articles.author: Ritu Sharma
articles.title: 3 Russian Su-34 Fighters ‘Shot Down’, 6 Aviators ‘Killed’ As Patriot Missiles Down RuAF Jets, Ukraine Claims - EurAsian Times
articles.description: In one of the most significant single-day losses for the Russian Air Force in recent times, Ukraine shot down three Russian Su-34 Fullback fighter-bombers. Kyiv has claimed that the US-supplied Patriot surface-to-air missiles made the kill, and six Russian av…
